inclusion.criterion: severe obstructive sleep apnea syndrome and / or alveolar hypoventilation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: the pediatric non-invasive ventilation and sleep unit of Necker-Enfants Malades hospital
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Child's caregivers not opposing to the patient's participation in research
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Child in an unstable clinical condition
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 57-year-old man with abdominal pain and vomiting. He drinks around 60 units of alcohol per week and smokes 22 cigarettes per day.
